text: niṅṅaḷ bhāryamāre sparśikkukayēā, avaruṭe vivāhamūlyaṁ niścayikkukayēā ceyyunnatinu mumpāyi niṅṅaḷavarumāyuḷḷa bandhaṁ vērpeṭuttiyāl (mah‌ṟ nalkāttatinṟe pēril) niṅṅaḷkk kuṟṟamilla. ennāl avarkk niṅṅaḷ maryādayanusaricc jīvitavibhavamāyi enteṅkiluṁ nalkēṇṭatāṇ‌. kaḻivuḷḷavan tanṟe kaḻivanusariccuṁ, ñerukkamuḷḷavan tanṟe sthitikkanusariccuṁ. sad‌vr̥ttarāya āḷukaḷkk iteāru bādhyatayatre
